values:
Lost some of the anger, i wish i could get it back.  I want to get her out of my mind but i dont.  When i try to get her out of my mind, its like a Wile E. Coyote - RoadRunner cartoon. With me as the Coyote.  I just cant succeed. 

I wish we could get together again.

Its like waiting for a movie sequel.  There's room for the sequel, so much more they needed to do that they couldnt finish it all in one movie, they gotta do more.  

Only difference with this situation, i dont know if i can look forward to any trailers about this.


Damn i want her back.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/3792.html
Dammit i should have known it was coming.  The bitch broke up with me.  Damn it to hell! I just want to fucking shout out to the world !
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/3568.html

She's off having fun in her hometown, about 300 miles from me.  Too busy to call me but once and never answers my phone calls.  What should i do for fun?  Havent tried to call her for the last few days to see if she would call me.  No calls.  Did get a text message saying i should stop missing her so much.  Apparently she's always out and about, shopping or playing with the baby.  Yeah....right.  


I need some liquor...bad.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/3265.html

Wow, just wonderful.  Get to spend the holidays with the same people who brought you complaints and bad driving...and the girlfriend is still home for the holidays and neither of us can get to the other one. Well at least i cant.  Some people have to work ya know.  Her...well apparently she's so bored she wont leave to come see me...

yep its a great life.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/2903.html

Aint they a bitch?

Strange, i feel like ive gone back in time.  

I keep thinking about the past...specifcally high school, the plays i used to be/work on.  And then i pass a wreck on the same spot with two almost identical cars to the ones that were in my original wreck in the same spot. 

Felt like Marty McFly passing the same stuff in BTTF 2.  

Had to make sure and ask the first person i came across what year it was.  Im sure they thought i was nuts.  I was pretty woozy when i first woke up and suddenly it didnt seem like such an absurd thing to do.


Damn crazy if you ask me.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/2609.html

after a so so day of work, i find im deserted by my girlfriend....again.  And the perpetual promise of "ill see you tomorrow".   

Im not holdin my breath anymore.  If i hold anymore, im going to turn three shades past blue.  She's a bitch.  Why is it i have to call her 300 times before she answers, and if i dont answer on the first ring she gives me...ive lost my chance to see her?   Talk about bloody unfair.   To hell with her.  Im going to give her one last chance.  Then...if it happens again...what do you know..im a free man.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/2531.html

i swear...is it possible to love someone and then be really pissed with them all in 2 seconds of time?  I feel like she's a drug that ive been trying to quit.  Dying to see her, and then ..wanting to the fuck away faster than Superman can fly.  I think she's the same way.  On the phone...nothing but "i want to see you, i love you" over and over again...and once im there..."you have to leave" just up out of the blue,...and i didnt even do anything!  I kinda feel like those N and S magnets...wanting to get close but still pushing away even as we get closer...not an exact similie but it will do for now.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/2083.html

I dont know now.  Everyone i talk to says the same thing. That she's cheating/doesnt want to be with me.

From everything i see, that was what i thought too...but i didnt know if maybe i was just too close to the situation to be scientific or whatever about it.

Women dont call their boyfriends someone else's name do they?

Women LIKE taking pictures with their boyfriends dont they?

Why the hell does she not take pics with me, when there are 50 on her damn camera with her and other people...especially her "friend" Matt, and only two of me..that she took while i was working one night?

It doesnt make sense any other way.


oooaaahhhhhh....


What do i do now?
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/1871.html

damn...well, ive been working so much lately, ive been going on the whole 3 hours of sleep in 3 days thing.  Better get my ass to bed tonight or else i aint going to be able to do anything tomorrow except drool on people.

But on the plus side, at least im feelin like the man with the plan, the Big cheese, the top boss, the Head honcho..

now i keep thinking of that scene from Airplane with Steve Stucker.."There's a sale at Pennys!"

Cue slapstick 

and scene...or bedtime...or whatever...
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/1391.html

Damn this sucks.  First get yelled at by the boss as im walking out the damn door of work after close, my girlfriend is so fucked up i gotta drive her and her drunk ass friends home to a damn different state!, and then she's so fucked up i cant even have any....

And to top it all off...i just ripped my fucking brand new pair of pants pocket when i was sitting down just now...Great Just FUCKING GREAT!!!
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/1083.html

I have a friend who is leaving town pretty soon and I and my girlfriend decided to take her out on the town to celebrate her last night here.  We ended up eating dinner at a place called the crab shack, then out to play some pool in a bar downtown.  I couldnt believe who showed up to play next to us...a ..well best way to describe it would be a woman with HUGE breasts who was hot as hell.  Was kinda funny to see her have on a shirt tied up underneath her boobs with "im up here" with an arrow across those big knockers but damn did i spend a lot of the night reading that.  All the more reason i kept missing my shots in pool...lol.  WNYX newstime 2:54am...
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/1009.html

The whole pc, livejournal site just seemed to completely skip Sunday.  Granted, i normally love to skip sundays, but not this one. Im off on Sunday and i really dont wont to work the Monday the 1st yet!

Either that or else im just completely spaced out right now... either could be true..

WNYX newstime 1:17 a.m. Back whenever...
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/630.html

Well, i heard about this site from a friend and decided i should probably give it a try.  There are only so many things i can say...well so far anyway.  Dont really have time to make a full one right now but i guess i will have to do another update later...WNYX newstime, 4:28 am.  back whenever.
http://davenelson.livejournal.com/396.html
